name: Run & Run Coliseum
description:
This is my second game ever, and the first that I did almost everything that I wanted to do... I'm learning a lot day by day, and I'm really proud of that game.

In the game you only escape and try to achieve the best Hi-Score, there's a Online Leaderboards system and a lot of love in every detail.

I did almost everything (art and programming), besides the musics that I got on freesound.org (great songs and sounds that i found there).

I want to give credits especially for:

Migufs20 fot and Bertsz for their great guitar musics they offer in the site.

Thanks for playing and I hope you liked to play as much as I liked to make this game!!
